All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AssetSetter
This class implements the objects: bronze coins, axe, blue shield, heart, mana crystal, the non-player character: old man, the monsters: green slimes and red mages and the interactive tile: dry trees and trunk on the map.
CollisionChecker
class to check collision between entities, objects and tiles
Config
allows saves and loads of volume, and full screen mode
Entity
class entity defines all monsters, player characters and npc's characteristics, behaviors, actions and attributes
EventHandler
handles events such as healing points, and damage traps
EventRect
instantiates class EventRect to handle events
GamePanel
This class implements the game screen.
InteractiveTile
This class implements the Interactive Tile This class inherits the class Entity.
IT_DryTree
This class implements the Interactive Tile Dry Tree This class inherits the class Interactive Tile
IT_Trunk
This class implements the Interactive Tile Trunk This class inherits the class Interactive Tile
KeyHandler
class to allow keyboard input and handle cursor/player movements
Main
This class implements the JFrame Window.
MON_GreenSlime
This class implements the monster green slime.
MON_Mage
This class implements the monster mage.
NPC_Oldman
This class implements the non-player character old man.
OBJ_Axe
This class implements the object Axe.
OBJ_Boots
This class implements the object Boots.
OBJ_Chest
This class implements the object Chest.
OBJ_Coin_Bronze
This class implements the object Bronze coin.
OBJ_Door
This class implements the object Door.
OBJ_Fireball
This class implements the object Fireball.
OBJ_Heart
This class implements the object Heart.
OBJ_Key
This class implements the object Key.
OBJ_ManaCrystal
This class implements the object Mana Crystal.
OBJ_NoWep
This class implements the object No Weapon.
OBJ_Potion_Red
This class implements the object Red Potion.
OBJ_Rock
This class implements the object Rock.
OBJ_Shield_Blue
This class implements the object Blue Shield.
OBJ_Shield_Wood
This class implements the object Wooden Shield.
OBJ_StrongAxe
This class implements the object Strong Axe.
OBJ_Sword_Normal
This class implements the object Normal Sword.
Particle
Subclass of class Entity, used to create particles when attacking and receiving attacks
Player
defines Class player, a subclass of Entity, which takes care of all player initialisations and interactions
Projectile
This class implements the projectile.
Sound
This implements the sounds of the added audio files.
Tile
class defining initial attributes of tiles
TileManager
Sets up the interactions of non interactive tiles
UI
This class handles the User Interface.
UtilityTool
This class scales up the image taken as input
